name: {keyword}_help_message
value:
Welcome to the {BotName} bot

!{botname_lowercase} help - To display this message
!{botname_lowercase} example - To view the example command

name: {keyword}_error_capability_mod+
value: (N) {nickname} ({subscriberId}), you must be at least mod to use this command

name: {keyword}_get_arguments_error_provide_arguments_message
value: (N) {nickname} ({subscriberId}), you must provide at least 1 argument for this command

name: {botname_lowercase}_error_not_privileged_message
value: (N) {nickname} ({subscriberId}), you are not allowed to use this command

name: {botname_lowercase}_join_error_provide_group_id_message
value:
(N) {nickname} ({subscriberId}), you must provide the group ID that you want me to join
Example: !{botname_lowercase} join 123, <password (Optional)>

name: {botname_lowercase}_joined_message
value: (Y) {nickname} ({subscriberId}), I have joined the requested group

name: {botname_lowercase}_join_error_message
value:
(N) {nickname} ({subscriberId}), I could not join the requested group
Reason: {error}

name: {botname_lowercase}_join_error_invalid_argument_message
value: (N) {nickname} ({subscriberId}), '{arg}' is not a valid group ID
